程序包 com.owl.downloader.core

类 Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.owl.downloader.core.Session
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    public final class Session
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Session is a singleton class used to manage all the tasks, session also holds some global configurations.

    Note that there is no guarantee that the configuration changes are applied immediately

    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Ricardo Evans
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      long downloadSpeed()
      Get the overview download speed, which is the sum of the task's download speed

      Set the maximum active task count

      Set the proxy selector
      void start()
      Start the session, some initializations done here, all the tasks cannot be executed until the session is started
      void stop()
      Stop the session, release the resources
      long uploadSpeed()
      Get the overview upload speed, which is the sum of the task's upload speed

    • 方法详细资料

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the session, some initializations done here, all the tasks cannot be executed until the session is started

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the session, release the resources

      • getInstance

        public static Session getInstance()
        Get the unique instance
        返回:
        the unique instance

      • getTasks

        public java.util.List<Task> getTasks()
        Get the existing tasks
        返回:
        the readonly list of existing tasks

      • insertTask

        public void insertTask​(Task task)
        Add the given task to session, which means the task get opportunity to be executed
        参数:
        task - the task to be added

      • removeTask

        public void removeTask​(Task task)
        Remove the given task from session
        参数:
        task - the task to be removed
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the task to be removed is in ACTIVE status

      • getMaxTasks

        public int getMaxTasks()
        Get the maximum active task count
        返回:
        the maximum active task count

      • setMaxTasks

        public void setMaxTasks​(int maxTasks)
        Set the maximum active task count
        参数:
        maxTasks - the maximum active task count
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the maxTasks is not positive

      • downloadSpeed

        public long downloadSpeed()
        Get the overview download speed, which is the sum of the task's download speed
        返回:
        the overview download speed

      • uploadSpeed

        public long uploadSpeed()
        Get the overview upload speed, which is the sum of the task's upload speed
        返回:
        the overview upload speed

      • getKeepaliveTime

        public int getKeepaliveTime()
        Get the keepalive time of idle thread used to execute tasks, in seconds

        The default value is 60 seconds

        返回:
        the keepalive time of idle thread

      • setKeepaliveTime

        public void setKeepaliveTime​(int keepaliveTime)
        Set the keepalive time of idle thread, in seconds
        参数:
        keepaliveTime - the keepalive time of idle thread
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the keepalive time to be set is negative

      • getProxySelector

        public java.net.ProxySelector getProxySelector()
        Get the proxy selector
        返回:
        the proxy selector

        public void setProxySelector​(java.net.ProxySelector proxySelector)
        Set the proxy selector
        参数:
        proxySelector - the proxy selector
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given proxy selector is null
